errors.no_permissions_should_we_continue_anyway: In order to let you continue we can exclude the part of data you don't have access.
errors.not_enough_permissions_title: It seems you do not have enough permissions to view the full set of information.
errors.no_access_to_this_template_line1: Please contact PlatformSupport@cimpress.com to request access to this template.
errors.not_enough_permission_description_concre: Please contact PlatformSupport@cimpress.com to request admin access to the following resources:
errors.template-not-found: We could not find the requested template!

translations.button_edit_template_tooltip: Edit this in Template Designer (external link).
translations.you_see_this_template_because_it_is_in_u: You don't have access to preview this template.
translations.change-modal-description: Please select a template you'd like to apply.
translations.new-template-modal-clone-description: A new template will be created with contents exactly as the current one.
translations.button_manage_access_tooltip: View or manage access for this template.
